name: wox-plugin-obsidian
description: A Wox plugin to manage obsidian vault

scripts.build: pnpm clean && ncc build src/index.ts -o dist && babel dist --out-dir dist
scripts.dev: pnpm build && mkdir -p ~/.config/wox/plugins/Wox.Plugin.Obsidian && cp -r dist/index.js ~/.config/wox/plugins/Wox.Plugin.Obsidian/ && cp plugin.json ~/.config/wox/plugins/Wox.Plugin.Obsidian/
scripts.clean: node -e "var { rmdirSync, existsSync } = require('fs'), path = require('path'); ['./dist'].forEach(fPath => {if (existsSync(path.join(__dirname, fPath))) rmdirSync(path.join(__dirname, fPath), { recursive: true })}); process.exit(0);"
scripts.package: pnpm build && cp -r images dist && cp -r plugin.json dist && cd dist && zip -r ../Wox.Plugin.Obsidian.wox *.js *.json images
